example.name: Water Tank
example.description: Standard water tank model, which regulates water level y between 1 and 12 by filling or emptying the water tank

example.name: Bouncing Ball
example.description: A fully parametric version of the bouncing ball that jumps up and down while being bounced back from the ground.

example.name: Controlled Moving Point
example.description: Simple example of a controlled moving point that moves towards zero.
